Package net.sf.excelutils.tags

Interface Summary
ITag ITag is a interface which define the tag
 

Class Summary
CallTag CallTag is a class which parse the #call tag
EachTag EachTag is a class which parse the #each tag
ForeachTag ForeachTag is a class which parse the #foreach tag
FormulaTag FormulaTag is a class which can output excel formula
IfTag IfTag is a class which parse #if #else #end
PageTag PageTag is a class which parse the #page tag Because a bug in POI, you must place a split char in your sheet near the #page tag
SumTag SumTag is a class which parse the #sum tag
